context_for_next_testing_agent: Date picker UI components verified: MonthPicker shows 'Feb 2026' format with calendar icon on Star Rating, Payroll pages. DatePicker shows 'dd/mm/yyyy' format with calendar icon on Attendance, Reports pages. LOP calculation verified: Early Out = 0.5 day LOP, Late Login = 0.5 day LOP. Adhitya Charan has 2 Early Out days resulting in 1.0 total LOP days.

verification_summary.issue_1_date_picker_calendar_icon: FIXED - All date/month pickers now show calendar icon
verification_summary.issue_3_lop_half_day: FIXED - Late Login and Early Out calculated as 0.5 day LOP each
